name: partnership
reviewBody: I've heard on this board that the film lacked the myth of the series, and that other characters should have been introduced. Others have commented on the absence of the "other worldly" element. But i think the reason this movie fails is the lack of connection between the two main leads - what couple, of any sort, refers to each other by their surnames? I did not hear one one Fox or Dana. If this movie was meant to cement the partnership then maybe we need a third one because this effort was sorely lacking its human element. I won't say this film is waste of your time but lets look at it this way; If your are new to the franchise will it excite you to see the TV series? If you are a convert do you to still believe?
